text: The 2011 Open Prévadiès Saint–Brieuc was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the eighth edition of the tournament which was part of the 2011 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Saint-Brieuc, France between 28 March – 3 April 2011. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Máximo González |98 |1 |- | |Michał Przysiężny |117 |2 |- | |Benoît Paire |124 |3 |- | |Conor Niland |139 |4 |- | |Vincent Millot |161 |5 |- | |Stéphane Robert |166 |6 |- | |Jerzy Janowicz |168 |7 |- | |David Guez |170 |8 |} * Rankings are as of March 21, 2011. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Charles- Antoine Brézac * Nicolas Devilder * Mathieu Rodrigues * Ludovic Walter The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Adrian Cruciat * Florent Diep * Boris Pašanski * Nicolas Renavand ==Champions== ===Singles=== Maxime Teixeira def. Benoît Paire, 6–3, 6–0 ===Doubles=== Tomasz Bednarek / Andreas Siljeström def. Grégoire Burquier / Romain Jouan, 6–4, 6–7(4), [14–12] ==External links== *Official Website *ITF Search *ATP official site Open Prevadies Saint-Brieuc Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in France Category:Saint-Brieuc Challenger Category:2011 in French sport Category:March 2011 sports events in Europe Category:April 2011 sports events in Europe
title: 2011 Open Prévadiès Saint–Brieuc
